issue.title: Removing x11 dependency for Official DockerHub repo

content.raw: Yeah, we can close this issue. It may be a moot point. I think the only way to remove the x11 dependency is to create a special `gzserver` that does not use the sensor library. As far as I can tell, X11 is mandatory for offscreen rendering on linux. There might be clever way around it.
content.html: Yeah, we can close this issue. It may be a moot point. I think the only way to remove the x11 dependency is to create a special gzserver that does not use the sensor library. As far as I can tell, X11 is mandatory for offscreen rendering on linux. There might be clever way around it.
